verses.verse: הֲיָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> ha-ya-Da'-ta, Knowest עֵ֭ת <WH6256> 'et thou the time לֶ֣דֶת <WH3205> Le-det bring forth יַעֲלֵי־ <WH3277> ya-'a-lei- when the wild goats סָ֑לַע <WH5553> Sa-la'; of the rock חֹלֵ֖ל <WH2342> cho-Lel do calve אַיָּל֣וֹת <WH355> ai-ya-Lot when the hinds תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> tish-Mor. ;[or] canst thou mark

תִּסְפֹּ֣ר <WH5608> tis-Por Canst thou number יְרָחִ֣ים <WH3391> ye-ra-Chim the months תְּמַלֶּ֑אנָה <WH4390> te-mal-Le-nah; [that] they fulfil וְ֝יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> ve-ya-Da'-ta, ;or knowest עֵ֣ת <WH6256> 'et thou the time לִדְתָּֽנָה׃ <WH3205> lid-Ta-nah. when they bring forth

תִּ֭כְרַעְנָה <WH3766> Tich-ra'-nah They bow יַלְדֵיהֶ֣ן <WH3206> yal-dei-Hen their young ones תְּפַלַּ֑חְנָה <WH6398> te-fal-Lach-nah; themselves they bring forth חֶבְלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH2256> chev-lei-Hem their sorrows תְּשַׁלַּֽחְנָה׃ <WH7971> te-shal-Lach-nah. they cast out

יַחְלְמ֣וּ <WH2492> yach-le-Mu are in good liking בְ֭נֵיהֶם <WH1121> Ve-nei-hem Their young ones יִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> yir-Bu they grow up בַבָּ֑ר <WH1250> vab-Bar; with corn יָ֝צְא֗וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U, they go forth וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not שָׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> Sha-vu and return לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who שִׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> shil-Lach Who hath sent out פֶּ֣רֶא <WH6501> Pe-re the wild ass חָפְשִׁ֑י <WH2670> cha-fe-Shi; free וּמֹסְר֥וֹת <WH4147> u-mo-se-Rot the bands עָ֝ר֗וֹד <WH6171> a-Rod, of the swift מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who פִתֵּֽחַ׃ <WH6605> fit-Te-ach. loosed

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- to whom שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> Sam-ti I have made עֲרָבָ֣ה <WH6160> 'a-ra-Vah the wilderness בֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> vei-To; Whose house וּֽמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֥יו <WH4908> u-mish-ke-no-Tav land his dwellings מְלֵֽחָה׃ <WH4420> me-Le-chah. and the barren

יִ֭שְׂחַק <WH7832> Yis-chak He scorneth לַהֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> la-ha-Mon the multitude קִרְיָ֑ה <WH7151> kir-Yah; of the city תְּשֻׁא֥וֹת <WH8663> te-shu-'ot he the crying נ֝וֹגֵ֗שׂ <WH5065> no-Ges, of the driver לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo does not יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> yish-Ma'. neither regardeth

יְת֣וּר <WH3491> ye-Tur The range הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> ha-Rim of the mountains מִרְעֵ֑הוּ <WH4829> mir-'E-hu; [is] his pasture וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char after כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every יָר֣וֹק <WH3387> ya-Rok every green thing יִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH1875> yid-Roosh. and he searcheth

הֲיֹ֣אבֶה <WH14> ha-Yoeh be willing רֵּ֣ים <WH7214> reim Will the unicorn עָבְדֶ֑ךָ <WH5647> 'a-ve-De-cha; to serve אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Or יָ֝לִ֗ין <WH3885> ya-Lin, thee or abide עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and אֲבוּסֶֽךָ׃ <WH18> 'a-vu-Se-cha. crib

הֲ‍ ֽתִקְשָׁר־ <WH7194> hatik-shor- Canst thou bind רֵ֭ים <WH7214> reim the unicorn בְּתֶ֣לֶם <WH8525> be-Te-lem A furrow עֲבֹת֑וֹ <WH5688> a-vo-To; with his band אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Or יְשַׂדֵּ֖ד <WH7702> ye-sad-Ded harrow עֲמָקִ֣ים <WH6010> 'a-ma-Kim the valleys אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-cha. after

הֲֽתִבְטַח־ <WH982> ha-tiv-tach- Wilt thou trust בּ֭וֹ bo כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because רַ֣ב <WH7227> rav is great כֹּח֑וֹ <WH3581> ko-Cho; him because his strength וְתַעֲזֹ֖ב <WH5800> ve-ta-'a-Zo and leave אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about יְגִיעֶֽךָ׃ <WH3018> ye-gi-'E-cha. thy labour

הֲתַאֲמִ֣ין <WH539> ha-ta-'a-Min Wilt thou believe בּ֭וֹ bo כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for; יָשׁוּב ya-shuv כיָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> ya-Shiv break קזַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> zar-'E-cha; thy seed וְֽגָרְנְךָ֥ <WH1637> ve-ga-re-ne-Cha your threshing יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ <WH622> ye-'e-Sof. and gather

כְּנַף־ <WH3671> ke-naf- wings רְנָנִ֥ים <WH7443> re-na-Nim [Gavest thou] the goodly נֶעֱלָ֑סָה <WH5965> ne-'e-La-sah; unto the peacocks אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo אֶ֝בְרָ֗ה <WH84> 'ev-Rah, ;or wings חֲסִידָ֥ה <WH2624> cha-si-Dah and feathers וְנֹצָֽה׃ <WH5133> ve-no-Tzah. and plumage

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> ta-'a-Zo Which leaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> la-'A-retz in the earth בֵּצֶ֑יהָ <WH1000> be-Tzei-ha; her eggs וְֽעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- in עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> 'a-Far them in dust תְּחַמֵּֽם׃ <WH2552> te-cham-Mem. and warmeth

וַ֭תִּשְׁכַּח <WH7911> Vat-tish-kach And forgetteth כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel that the foot תְּזוּרֶ֑הָ <WH2115> te-zu-Re-ha; may crush וְחַיַּ֖ת <WH2416> ve-chai-Yat beast הַשָּׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh them or that the wild תְּדוּשֶֽׁהָ׃ <WH1758> te-du-She-ha. may break

הִקְשִׁ֣יחַ <WH7188> hik-Shi-ach She is hardened בָּנֶ֣יהָ <WH1121> ba-Nei-ha against her young ones לְּלֹא־ <WH3808> le-lo- as though [they were] not לָ֑הּ Lah; לְרִ֖יק <WH7385> le-Rik is in vain יְגִיעָ֣הּ <WH3018> ye-gi-'Ah hers her labour בְּלִי־ <WH1097> be-li- without פָֽחַד׃ <WH6343> Fa-chad. without fear

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because הִשָּׁ֣הּ <WH5382> hish-Shah hath deprived אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> e-Lo-ah Because God חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> choch-mah her of wisdom וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not חָ֥לַק <WH2505> Cha-lak neither hath he imparted לָ֝֗הּ Lah, בַּבִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> bab-bi-Nah. to her understanding

כָּ֭עֵת <WH6256> Ka-'et What time בַּמָּר֣וֹם <WH4791> bam-ma-Rom herself on high תַּמְרִ֑יא <WH4754> tam-Ri; she lifteth up תִּֽשְׂחַ֥ק <WH7832> tis-Chak she scorneth לַ֝סּ֗וּס <WH5483> las-Sus, the horse וּלְרֹֽכְבֽוֹ׃ <WH7392> u-le-Ro-che-Vo. and his rider

הֲתִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> ha-tit-Ten Hast thou given לַסּ֣וּס <WH5483> las-Sus the horse גְּבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> ge-vu-Rah; force הֲתַלְבִּ֖ישׁ <WH3847> ha-tal-Bish apparel צַוָּאר֣וֹ <WH6677> tzav-va-Ro his neck רַעְמָֽה׃ <WH7483> ra'-Mah. thunder

הְֽ֭תַרְעִישֶׁנּוּ <WH7493> He-tar-'i-shen-nu Canst thou make him afraid כָּאַרְבֶּ֑ה <WH697> ka-'ar-Beh; grasshopper ה֖וֹד <WH1935> Hod beauty נַחְר֣וֹ <WH5170> nach-Ro of his nostrils אֵימָֽה׃ <WH367> 'ei-Mah. [is] terrible

יַחְפְּר֣וּ <WH2658> yach-pe-Ru He paweth בָ֭עֵמֶק <WH6010> Va-'e-mek in the valley וְיָשִׂ֣ישׂ <WH7797> ve-ya-Sis and rejoiceth בְּכֹ֑חַ <WH3581> be-Cho-ach; in [his] strength יֵ֝צֵ֗א <WH3318> ye-Tze, he goeth on לִקְרַאת־ <WH7125> lik-rat- to meet נָֽשֶׁק׃ <WH5402> Na-shek. the armed men

יִשְׂחַ֣ק <WH7832> yis-Chak He mocketh לְ֭פַחַד <WH6343> Le-fa-chad at fear וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יֵחָ֑ת <WH2865> ye-Chat; and is not affrighted וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- does not יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <WH7725> ya-Shuv, neither turneth he back מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei- from חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> Cha-rev. the sword

עָ֭לָיו <WH5921> 'A-lav against תִּרְנֶ֣ה <WH7439> tir-Neh rattleth אַשְׁפָּ֑ה <WH827> 'ash-Pah; The quiver לַ֖הַב <WH3851> La-hav against him the glittering חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> cha-Nit spear וְכִידֽוֹן׃ <WH3591> ve-chi-Don. and the shield

בְּרַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> be-Ra-'ash with fierceness וְ֭רֹגֶז <WH7267> Ve-ro-gez and rage יְגַמֶּא־ <WH1572> ye-gam-me- He swalloweth אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; the ground וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- does not יַ֝אֲמִ֗ין <WH539> ya-'a-Min, neither believeth כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- at ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol he that [it is] the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> sho-Far. of the trumpet

בְּדֵ֤י <WH1767> be-Dei among שֹׁפָ֨ר׀ <WH7782> sho-Far the trumpets יֹ֘אמַ֤ר <WH559> yo-Mar He saith הֶאָ֗ח <WH1889> he-'Ach, Ha וּֽ֭מֵרָחוֹק <WH7350> U-me-ra-chok afar off יָרִ֣יחַ <WH7306> ya-Ri-ach and he smelleth מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah; the battle רַ֥עַם <WH7482> Ra-'am the thunder שָׂ֝רִים <WH8269> rim of the captains וּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> u-te-ru-'Ah. and the shouting

הֲ‍ ֽ֭מִבִּינָ֣תְךָ <WH998> hamib-bi-Na-te-cha by thy wisdom יַֽאֲבֶר־ <WH82> ya-'a-ver- fly נֵ֑ץ <WH5322> Netz; Doth the hawk יִפְרֹ֖שׂ <WH6566> yif-Ros [and] stretch; כְּנָפֹו ke-na-fov ככְּנָפָ֣יו <WH3671> ke-na-Fav bird קלְתֵימָֽן׃ <WH8486> le-tei-Man. south side אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at

פִּ֭יךָ <WH6310> Pi-cha at thy command יַגְבִּ֣יהַּ <WH1361> yag-Bi-ah mount up נָ֑שֶׁר <WH5404> Na-sher; Doth the eagle וְ֝כִ֗י <WH3588> ve-Chi, for יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> ya-Rim on high קִנּֽוֹ׃ <WH7064> kin-No. her nest

סֶ֣לַע <WH5553> Se-la' on the rock יִ֭שְׁכֹּן <WH7931> Yish-kon She dwelleth וְיִתְלֹנָ֑ן <WH3885> ve-yit-lo-Nan; and abideth עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שֶׁן־ <WH8127> shen- upon the crag סֶ֝֗לַע <WH5553> Se-la', of the rock וּמְצוּדָֽה׃ <WH4686> u-me-tzu-Dah. and the strong place

מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there חָֽפַר־ <WH2658> cha-far- From thence she seeketh אֹ֑כֶל <WH400> 'O-chel; the prey לְ֝מֵרָח֗וֹק <WH7350> le-me-ra-Chok, afar off עֵינָ֥יו <WH5869> 'ei-Nav [and] her eyes יַבִּֽיטוּ׃ <WH5027> yab-Bi-tu. behold

וְאֶפְרֹחֹו ve-'ef-ro-chov כוְאֶפְרֹחָ֥יו <WH667> ve-'ef-ro-Chav young קיְעַלְעוּ־ <WH5966> ye-'al-'u- also suck up דָ֑ם <WH1818> Dam; blood וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> u-va-'a-Sher and where חֲ֝לָלִ֗ים <WH2491> cha-la-Lim, and where the slain שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham are there הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. [are] there [is] she פ Peh
